Key Match Events: India dismissed Ireland for just 96 runs
Rohit Sharma and Rishabh Pant helped India to an eight-wicket win
Arshdeep Singh dismissed both Irish openers in the third over
Hardik Pandya got a wicket in the seventh over
Jasprit Bumrah then struck in the ninth
The freefall never really stopped as Pandya added two more wickets to his tally
Axar Patel got one in the only over of spin in the innings through a brilliant catch that he himself took
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma has won the toss and chosen to field first
No Kuldeep Yadav, Yashasvi Jaiswal for India
Post-Match Reflections: Jasprit Bumrah is the player of the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Two spinners and three seamers for Ireland
Others: India vs Ireland, T20 World Cup 2024 Highlights: IND thrash IRE by eight wickets
